Key Match Events: Lahiru Kumara was named the Player of the Match with figures of 3/35
England scored 156 runs in their innings
Sri Lanka won the match by 8 wickets with 146 balls remaining
Pathum Nissanka scored 77 runs for Sri Lanka
Post-Match Reflections: No post-match reflections provided in the article
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played under lights at the M Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru
The toss was won by England who elected to bat first
Lahiru Kumara was named the Man of the Match
Others: The match was part of the ICC Cricket World Cup 2023-24
The match number was ODI no. 4682
The match started at 14:00 local time with a first session from 14:00-17:30, an interval from 17:30-18:00, and a second session from 18:00-21:30
The match referee was Javagal Srinath
